metadata.dc:author: Perdiguero, M
Ros Mar, Z
López Gutiérrez, J C
metadata.dc:description: We present the results obtained in the treatment of facial hypertrophic scars in children admitted in the Pediatric Burn Unit of the Hospital Infantil La Paz (Madrid). During the last 30 months 13 patients, with ages ranging from 3 months to 5 years, have been treated. Compared to the elastic pressure masks, rigid masks have yielded better results both on the short and the long term. Rigid masks of Thermo-Vac material turn out to be more comfortable and easier to wear and tolerate than the classical elastic appliances.
metadata.dc:title: Aplicación de Thermo-Vac en secuelas de quemaduras faciales en niños.
[The usage of thermo-vac facial masks for the treatment of hypertrophic scars in children].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cirugia pediatrica : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Cirugia Pediatrica
